parameter.name: defaultCommand
parameter.label: Default Command
parameter.description: When the send command button is pressed, if no selection is made from the command channel then use this command by default. TIP: use "set_white" for RGBW globes to set back to white light quickly.

parameter.name: oneTriggersNightMode
parameter.label: 1 Triggers Night Mode
parameter.description: Night Mode is a much lower level of light and this allows it to be auto selected when your fader/slider moves to 1%. NOTE: Night mode locks out some controls of a physical remote.

parameter.name: powerFailsToMinimum
parameter.label: Default to the lowest level of light when the power fails.
parameter.description: If lights loose power from the power switch OR a power outage, they will default to the lowest brightness.

parameter.name: dimmedCT
parameter.label: Dimmed Colour Temp
parameter.description: Traditional globes grow warmer the more they are dimmed. Set this to 370, or leave blank to disable.

parameter.name: whiteHue
parameter.label: White Hue
parameter.description: When both the whiteHue and whiteSat values are seen by the binding it will trigger the white LEDS. Set to -1 to disable, 0 for Alexa, or 35 for Google Home.

parameter.name: whiteSat
parameter.label: White Saturation
parameter.description: When both the whiteHue and whiteSat values are seen by the binding it will trigger the white LEDS. Set to -1 to disable, 100 for Alexa or 32 for Google Home.

parameter.name: favouriteWhite
parameter.label: Favourite White
parameter.description: When one of the shortcuts triggers white mode, use this for the colour white instead of the default colour.
